name: Brainayan
description: Brainayan is a boutique learning and development consultancy founded and powered by ex-Google & Facebook specialists with deep experience in addressing the talent development challenges of South East Asia. The company delivers custom solutions situated in the values and culture of client companies and tailored to the specific needs of their C-suite, leadership, managers or entry-level employees.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Unleashing Unrealized Potential

Highlights.name: ORG DEVELOPMENT
Highlights.description: Build inclusive teams based on a solid foundation of trust and psychological safety that turn diversity into business impact.

Highlights.name: LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT
Highlights.description: Identify and strengthen your leadership bench with solutions fully contextualized for their world view, beliefs, and methods and delivered in formats that work for your organization.

Highlights.name: MANAGER DEVELOPMENT
Highlights.description: Offer your managers an opportunity to learn or fine-tune their people management skills through Brainayan’s Manager Basecamp and MApp.

enhanced_description: Brainayan is a boutique learning and development consultancy, founded and powered by ex-Google & Facebook specialists with deep experience in addressing talent development challenges, particularly in South East Asia. They provide professional training and coaching, delivering custom solutions aligned with client company values and culture. Their services are tailored to the specific needs of C-suite executives, leadership, managers, and entry-level employees, with a focus on accelerating skill development, improving learning efficiency, and fostering a more diverse and inclusive workforce. Key offerings include Organizational Development (building inclusive teams based on trust and psychological safety for business impact), Leadership Development (strengthening leadership with contextualized solutions), and Manager Development (fine-tuning people management skills through programs like Manager Basecamp and MApp). Specialized features include Diversity and Inclusion training, Communication Skills enhancement, and Psychometry.
key_use_cases: Accelerate skill development and learning efficiency within organizations.
Build a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
Develop inclusive teams, fostering trust and psychological safety for business impact.
Enhance people management skills for managers.
Improve communication skills across various employee levels.
Utilize psychometry for talent assessment and development.
competitive_advantages: Deep experience in addressing talent development challenges specific to South East Asia.
Delivery of custom solutions tailored to client company values, culture, and specific employee needs (C-suite, leadership, managers, entry-level).
Boutique consultancy approach enabling highly personalized service.
implementation_scenarios: Customized, project-based delivery of learning and development solutions.
Solutions contextualized to client's worldview, beliefs, and methods, delivered in formats optimal for their organization.
roi_benefits: Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency.
Improved people management skills among managers.
